name: horizonte-saber-sistema
description: Sistema Moderno Horizonte do Saber - React + Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run generate && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
